name: Quickdraw (MaplePoki)
description:
(it is recommended to fullscreen through the unity client)

Instructions - Press Spacebar to shoot

Wait for the sound queue (you'll know it when you hear it) or wait for the "Draw!" text to appear before you shoot. It takes 5-10 seconds after the walk. Shooting before that indicates a loss, cheater.

Plot (for those who really care about games having stories)

You are Agile Anders, rumoured to be the fastest in the west. Anyone would want to have that title, and so Cunning Clint stopped by, and wanted to ask how fast that hand really is. Show him who is boss!
